name: I'm not just playing games!
description:
Hello! This is my first time making a visual novel and using RenPy. Eventually I'd like to make a dating sim, but that seemed daunting for my first NaNoRenO.  So for my first project I decided to do a short kinetic VN about meeting someone for the first time

I don't normally write and drawing is just a hobby for me so...I apologize in advance if the quality is a little sketch (〃￣ω￣〃)ゞ I tried. Hopefully it's a cute little story regardless!
